name: Monster Artifacts
description:
Monster Artifacts is made for the  7 day clicker Jam Spring 2023 (Although it was extended I'm not using that time).

Theme: Another Direction. I'm stretching it with the theme, choosing different artifacts to get a different direction style of playing.

Goal: Keep beating those monsters up until you get to the boss! But if the time runs out while facing the boss, you lose!

I hope you enjoy and thanks for playing!

Assets: Monster arthttps://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/2d-pixel-rpg-monster-pack-17...(Animations are made by me).
Sounds and music
